reasoning: Endometrioma is a chronic condition measured by prevalence. Occurs in ~25% of endometriosis cases. Endometriosis affects ~10% of reproductive-age women; endometriomas estimated at ~700 per 100k total population (all ages/sexes).
source: Giudice LC et al. (2004). Endometriosis. Lancet. 364(9447):1789-1799
